description: Lose Your Shoes is a&nbsp;champagne cocktail with an especially floral and herbal version. The drink was named after one woman who claimed she'd lose her shoes if she drank another glass of this cocktail.
name: Lose Your Shoes
recipeIngredient: Champagne, preferably Cremante de Bourgogne Blanc de Blancs
